mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_CHAT_ROOM_LIST (CHATROOM_NO, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_NAME, RECEIVER_NAME) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CHATROOM_NO),0) + 1 FROM MEMBER_CHAT_ROOM_LIST) , #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{senderName}, #{receiverName})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_CHAT_CONTENTS (CHATROOM_NO, SENDER_ID, CHAT_CONTENT) VALUES (#{chatroomNo}, #{senderId}, #{chatContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER_CHAT_ROOM_LIST WHERE SENDER_ID = #{userId} UNION SELECT * FROM MEMBER_CHAT_ROOM_LIST WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY CHAT_REGDATE DESC
